title: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
SR: This bug report lacks sufficient details in the 'OB', 'EB', and 'SR' sections. Based on the limited information provided, it seems that there is an issue with searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, which results in no search results. The bug report also mentions that searching via the context menu in the packages view works. The expected behavior for the search functionality is not clearly specified. To further investigate and reproduce the issue, please provide more details on the observed behavior, expected behavior, and steps to reproduce the bug.
